Package main.java.it.unipr.server

Class ServerHelper

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.server.ServerHelper
public class ServerHelper extends Object
The class ServerHelper manages the request sent by the client to the server.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>
